requirePluginVersions.message: Providing the plugin version explicitly makes the builds reproducible

RestrictImports.reason: Importing internal classes is not allowed
Importing shaded classes is not allowed
Not null is the default for the codebase and should not be annotated
These classes were introduced to overcome type inference issues in Java 8, but the regular org.assertj.core.api.Assertions works just fine and has a richer API

requireProperty.message: The main-class property must be specified when building an airlift tarball.
requireProperty.regexMessage: The main-class property can not be empty.
